Comment: This response provides a strong explanation of why Jesus is referred to as the 'Lamb of God' in connection to the sacrifices in the Old Testament. It effectively links Old Testament prophecies and sacrifices to the person and work of Jesus Christ, emphasizing His sinless nature and role as the perfect atoning sacrifice. The scriptural references are well utilized to support the explanation. Overall, this answer demonstrates a good understanding of the theological significance behind the title "Lamb of God." Great job!
